resources.string: "In classic mode You have 30 seconds to achieve the best score you can. \nEvery wrong hit takes You a point.\nHave fun playing! "
"In skill mode You are playing to the limit.\nOn beginning You have 3 lives which you can lose by pressing the wrong button.\nHave fun playing! "
"In time mode You are limited by time so be quick in pressing. \nMissed buttons are not taking Your points.\nHave fun playing!"
Thank You for using our app!
